gr.agroscape.agents

Class Plot

  • java.lang.Object
    • gr.agroscape.agents.Plot

  • public class Plot
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a Plot. Many GridPoints can constitute a Plot.

    The concern of this class is:
    • to give information about the Plot (Area, Average Soil Characteristics, etc.)
    Author:
    jkr

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getArea()
      Get the Area of the Plot (hectares)
      double getAverage(repast.simphony.valueLayer.GridValueLayer data)
      The average Value of all contained GridPoints in the GridValueLayer data
      For example, if someone wants to calculate the Average yield of the Plot for a specific Crop, he just has to pass the GridValueLayer that keeps the Yields for that Crop.
      java.util.ArrayList<repast.simphony.space.grid.GridPoint> getGridPoints()
      Get the GridPoints of the Plot
      double getSuitability(Crop c)
      Get the expected yield for the plot for a specified Plot.
      java.lang.String toString()

      • getArea

        public double getArea()
        Get the Area of the Plot (hectares)

      • getAverage

        public double getAverage(repast.simphony.valueLayer.GridValueLayer data)
        The average Value of all contained GridPoints in the GridValueLayer data
        For example, if someone wants to calculate the Average yield of the Plot for a specific Crop, he just has to pass the GridValueLayer that keeps the Yields for that Crop.
        Returns:
